original_title: William F. Buckley Jr.'s Celestial Navigation Simplified
overview: Join this world-renowned personality for the most unique program on celestial ever. Teaches the theory and practice of Celestial Navigation and also teaches the noon shot. Using computer graphics, he illuminates the finer points of GP, GHA, and GMT. Worth twelve weeks of night school.
title: William F. Buckley Jr.'s Celestial Navigation Simplified
